actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to encourage participation by children whose language is English in bilingual education programs under the Bilingual Education Act.

summary.text: Amends the Bilingual Education Act to authorize the participation of children whose primary language is English in bilingual education programs under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to encourage participation by children whose language is English in bilingual education programs under the Bilingual Education Act.
